member.name: T:FanKit.Transformers.CanvasTransformer
member.summary:
Transformer: Provide matrix by Position„ÄÅScale„ÄÅRadians.
TODO: Canvas Layer: The original size of the layer. Virtual Layer: Render all layers together and make their center points coincide with the origin (0,0) and then zoom; Control Layer: Rotate around the origin first, then shift. (The canvas has a rotation angle)
